SEARCH
Package src.controller

Class InventoryManager

Object
InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
Manages the inventory of medications, including adding, deleting, updating, and printing details of medications. Handles replenish requests and allows modifications to the stock.
Since:
2024-11-20
Version:
1.0
Author:
Benjamin Kam, Kee

  • Method Details

    • addNewMedication

      public static void addNewMedication(String name, int stock, int lowStockAlert)
      Adds a new medication to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medication
      stock - the stock quantity of the medication
      lowStockAlert - the threshold for low stock alert

    • deleteMedication

      public static boolean deleteMedication(String medicineID)
      Deletes a medication from the inventory by its ID.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - the ID of the medication to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the medication is successfully deleted, false if not found

    • updateMedication

      public static boolean updateMedication(String medicineID, int attributeCode, int newvalue)
      Updates the stock or low stock alert of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - the ID of the medication to be updated
      attributeCode - the code representing the attribute to be updated
      newvalue - the new value to set
      Returns:
      true if the medication is successfully updated, false if not found

    • getPendingRequests

      public static ArrayList<ReplenishRequest> getPendingRequests()
      Retrieves all pending replenish requests.
      Returns:
      a list of replenish requests that are in a pending state, or null if none

    • updateReplenishRequests

      public static boolean updateReplenishRequests(String requestID, int attributeCode)
      Updates the status of a replenish request.
      Parameters:
      requestID - the ID of the replenish request
      attributeCode - the attribute code representing the status change
      Returns:
      true if the request is successfully updated, false if not found

    • searchMedicineByID

      public static Medication searchMedicineByID(String medicineID)
      Searches for a medication by its ID.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - the ID of the medication to search for
      Returns:
      the medication if found, null if not

    • printAllMedication

      public static void printAllMedication()
      Prints all medications in the inventory.

    • initializeDummyMedication

      public static void initializeDummyMedication()
      Initializes dummy medication entries in the inventory.

    • printReplenishRequest

      public static void printReplenishRequest(ReplenishRequest replenishRequest)
      Prints details of a specific replenish request.
      Parameters:
      replenishRequest - the replenish request to be printed

    • printMedicationDetails

      public static void printMedicationDetails(Medication medication)
      Prints the details of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medication - the medication to print details for
